Topic.Title: Attacking a monster without equipping a weapon

Posts.EditableText:
Hi all,
Please make sure to equip a weapon (the fish) before doing anything.

Also, I know it says it's missing a parameter if you try attacking a monster without equipping a weapon. All you have to do is equip the weapon. I'll fix the problem later.
Thanks
Posts.HTML:
Hi all,
Please make sure to equip a weapon (the fish) before doing anything.

Also, I know it says it's missing a parameter if you try attacking a monster without equipping a weapon. All you have to do is equip the weapon. I'll fix the problem later.
Thanks
